  C version
  Test the ASA091 library.

TEST01:
  Perform a simple sample calculation using
  PPCHI2 to invert the Chi-Squared CDF.

  P =                        0.0175230000000000
  V =                        4.0000000000000000

  VALUE (correct) =          0.4000000000000000

  Error flag IFAULT = 4
